content: about a month a go i asked in the stories should i write a beanie pattern and here you go it s really simple i call this hallapipo it s like frost beanie in english❄️ i used 1 ball of drops air and needles size 4 5 but this is also suitable for yarns that gauge is about 17/10cm and sorry if there is some mistakes in my english you can find this in finnish in my ig account @triqtti
